name: The Complete 2024 Web Development Bootcamp
summary: Become a Full-Stack Web Developer with just ONE course. HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node, React, PostgreSQL, Web3 and DApps
learn: Build 16 web development projects for your portfolio, ready to apply for junior developer jobs.
Learn the latest technologies, including Javascript, React, Node and even Web3 development.
After the course you will be able to build ANY website you want.
Build fully-fledged websites and web apps for your startup or business.
